Welcome to ABBYY journey! Here you will find out: What is ABBYY? Where we come from? What we believe in and how we develop our company? What we value in ABBYY people? Enjoy the discovery!

Play Video
What is ABBYY

Founded in 1989 by David Yang, then the 4th-year physics student in Moscow, ABBYY is now a truly global company, provider of content intelligence solutions and services. Thousands of organizations, more than 50 million users in 200 countries rely on our solutions.

We create a complete range of technologies based on Artificial Intelligence that transform business documents and content into business value. By providing digital transformation solutions to financial services, insurance, transportation, healthcare and other industries, we help organizations achieve the next wave of growth, understand customers and deliver responsive real-time intelligent systems.

We have a worldwide presence with global offices in Europe (Munich, Germany), Russia (Moscow) and North America (Milpitas, California). ABBYY also has regional offices in Australia, UK, France, Spain, Ukraine, Japan, Taiwan and Cyprus.

History

• Was opened our office in Japan.

• In MIPT, the Department of Image Recognition and Text Processing began its work - the basic department of ABBYY.
The company has a new product line - the development of products for mobile platforms.

• ABBYY Recognition Server was released, a solution for streaming documents and organizing electronic archives in companies.

• We signed an agreement on international cooperation with Xerox.

• ABBYY Mobile OCR Engine - a tool for developing images in mobile devices.

The company has a new product line - the development of products for mobile platforms.

Values
We Care and go the extra mile Work as a team Innovate for customers Are Open-minded
We believe we help our customers gain competitive edge by addressing their current and future needs through innovations and technologies.

We strive to be the very best in everything we do. We care about superior execution.

We are proactive because we care about the success of our customers.


We use our drive to inspire our customers and partners.

We are proud of what we do and who we are.

We believe that strong teamwork and trust are vital for the company’s success.

We value the humanity component of the work. We are open, honest and ethical in our behavior.

We acknowledge differences in cultural backgrounds, ideas and opinions. We trust each other.

We seek what is best for ABBYY rather than ourselves or our group. We work in a transparent way.

We respect individuals
at all levels.

We celebrate wins of company
and each employee.

We solve problems together and not pass the buck or blame others.

We believe we help our customers gain competitive edge by addressing their current and future needs through innovations and technologies.

For us innovation is when we connect knowledge about customers with our engineering expertize, thus we create value for our customers.

Technology is our passion. We invest our time and knowledge in creating state-of-the-art intelligent solutions.

We engage and listen to customers, partners, analysts and thought leaders to understand and predict future customer needs.

In our reality new trends constantly shift and disrupt markets. We must be agile and ready for changes.

We test areas of potential value and focus on promising ones. We choose our battles and cut our losses.

We believe that creativity and innovation come from being open
to new things and learning from mistakes.

We continuously learn and are open to external knowledge. We develop, improve and take responsibility.

We are tolerant to mistakes. We accept that mistakes are a natural part of growth and improvement.


We are open-minded in exploring unchartered territories and taking risks.

We analyze our mistakes and wins honestly, and are open to a rapid change of direction if we see fit.

About Me

Hello, my name is

Maria Goryushkina

Short text about me.ABBYY is a global leader of content intelligent solutions and services. ABBYY offers a complete range of AI-based technologies and solutions transforming business documents and content into business value. By providing digital transformation solutions to financial services, insurance, transportation, healthcare and other industries, the company helps organizations achieve the next wave of growth by understanding customers and delivering responsive real-time intelligent systems.

About Me

Hello, my name is

Maria Goryushkina 1

Short text about me.ABBYY is a global leader of content intelligent solutions and services. ABBYY offers a complete range of AI-based technologies and solutions transforming business documents and content into business value. By providing digital transformation solutions to financial services, insurance, transportation, healthcare and other industries, the company helps organizations achieve the next wave of growth by understanding customers and delivering responsive real-time intelligent systems.
